name: Royal Guard
effect: When HP first falls below 30%, restores HP equal to 15% of own dual defenses per second. (This effect lasts for 8 seconds)

name: Shield Guard
effect: In battle, increases Physical Defense and Magic Defense by 7%.

name: Centurion
effect: For each Buff Status on self, increases own dual defense by 8%. (Up to 32% dual defense increase)

name: Martyr
effect: When receiving fatal damage, reduces the Attack of all enemies by 10%, and applies an additional [Attack Stat Debuff] to the damage source. (The Full Attack Reduction effect lasts for 8 seconds)

name: Standard Bearer
effect: In battle, increases own and nearby allies' dual defenses by 8.4%. (This effect cannot stack if carried by multiple Luminaries)

name: Veteran
effect: When applying any control Status, there is a 32% chance to increase self 300 Critical Resistance and gain 1 random [Defense Stat Buff]. (The Critical Resistance increase effect lasts for 3 seconds)

name: Avenger
effect: When dealing Damage, additionally inflicts [Adaptive Damage] equal to 4.5% of the bearer's Max HP. (The bearer's Physical and Magical Defense, as well as Damage Reduction, are reduced by 10% in battle) (DoT damage cannot trigger this effect)

name: Guardian
effect: When the HP of an Other Luminary first falls below 20%, immediately consumes 20% of current HP to grant it a Shield equal to 28% of self's max HP for 8 seconds. (This effect can trigger up to 3 times per battle)

name: Lionheart Knight
effect: When applying any control status, additionally reduces the controlled target's 21% Attack. (This effect lasts for 10 seconds)

name: Templar
effect: After accumulating damage equal to 70% of max HP, immediately gains 2 [Defense Stat Buff].

name: Vanguard Warrior
effect: When there are no allied melee Luminaries nearby, Physical and Magic Defense increases by 20%.

name: Acolyte
effect: At the start of battle, gain 1 Overdrive Point and increase Max HP by 2%. ([Energy Recovery Subclass] effects do not stack if carried by multiple Luminaries)

name: Believer
effect: Reduces enemy Overdrive Point Recovery Speed by 0.12 point(s)/s. ([Energy Reduction Subclass] effects do not stack if carried by multiple Luminaries)

name: Medic
effect: Increases Healing effects by 15.5%.

name: Cleric
effect: When healing a target below 50% HP, generate an shield equal to 11% of your max HP for 4 seconds. (6-second cooldown per target)

name: Fanatic
effect: At the start of battle, reduces enemy Overdrive Point Recovery Speed by 0.16 point(s)/s. ([Energy Reduction Subclass] effects do not stack if carried by multiple Luminaries)

name: Friar
effect: Increases allied Overdrive Point Recovery Speed by 0.14 point(s)/s. ([Energy Recovery Subclass] effects do not stack if carried by multiple Luminaries)

name: Hermit
effect: Heals the Luminary ally with lowest HP, restoring 3% of their max HP per second. (Triggers every 10s and lasts 3s)

name: Preacher
effect: When Overdrive is activated, boost Critical Hit by 300 for all frontline Luminary allies. (6 second duration)

name: Bishop
effect: Heals all allied Luminaries with Buffs every second, restoring 1% of their Max HP. For each Buff the target has, this healing is increased by 25%. (Up to 100%)

name: Divine Officer
effect: When Healing an allied unit, randomly grant an additional [Stat Buff]. (Max 1 trigger per target every 12s)

name: Executor
effect: At the start of battle, reduces enemy Overdrive Point Recovery Speed by 0.35 point(s)/s. ([Energy Reduction Subclass] effects do not stack if carried by multiple Luminaries)

name: High Priest
effect: Gain 1 Overdrive Point every 9.5s. (At the start of battle, gain 1 Overdrive Point) ([Energy Recovery Subclass] effects do not stack if carried by multiple Luminaries)

name: Inquisitor
effect: Inflict random [Stat Debuff] with each Damage dealt to enemy units. (Effect can trigger on each target once every 12 seconds)

name: Rogue
effect: For every 7 Basic Attacks or skills used, the next Attack deals Additional Damage equal to 148% of own Attack.

name: Thief
effect: After 4 Critical Hits, your next Attack deals an extra 80% of your Attack as bonus Damage.

name: Marauder
effect: When using Basic Attack, consume 3% of your current HP to deal additional Physical Damage equal to 12% of your current HP to the target.

name: Nightblade
effect: For each enemy unit defeated, Attack increases by 16.2%. (Stacks up to 3 times)

name: Scoundrel
effect: When landing a Critical Hit, Attack increases by 1.8%. (Stacks up to 15 times) (Loses 1 stack when failing to land a Critical Hit within 3 seconds)

name: Spy
effect: Each time you deal damage to a Luminary, your Attack increases by 5%. (Max Attack increase: 25%)

name: Executioner
effect: For each enemy unit defeated, gain 14% Attack and 6% Critical Damage boost. (stacks up to 3 times)

name: Forest Bandit
effect: Each time you deal damage, your Attack increases by 1.2%. (Stacks up to 20 times)

name: Masked Thief
effect: Each time you cast an Overdrive, gain 250 Critical Hit rate. (Stacks up to 4 times)

name: Outlaw
effect: For each enemy Luminary below 60% HP, your attack speed is increased by 36%. (Max Attack Speed increase: 108%)

name: Shadow Dancer
effect: After using any skill, your next 3 Basic Attacks deal 78% bonus Damage.

name: Fighter
effect: When HP drops below 60%, gains 9% Lifesteal.

name: Swordsman
effect: When dealing damage, ignores 10% of target's defenses. (Can stack up to 40%)

name: Arcane Duelist
effect: Increases Attack by 8% per buff. (Up to 32%)

name: Champion
effect: When dealing Damage, inflicts an Additional Attack equal to 26% of Attack as [Adaptive Damage].

name: Gladiator
effect: When attacking, reduce target's Defense and Special Defense by 9%. (If other Luminaries have this equipped, it does not stack) (Doesn't stack with Sword Master)

name: Knight
effect: After taking cumulative damage equal to 50% of max HP, immediately gains a random [Attack Stat Buff].

name: Berserker
effect: When dealing damage, additionally inflicts [Adaptive Damage] equal to 3.6% of self maximum HP. (DoT effects cannot trigger this effect)

name: Crusader
effect: When dealing damage, ignores 10% of target's defenses. (Can stack up to 40%)

name: Lord
effect: Gain 30% Overdrive Damage for each buff when using Overdrive. All buffs consumed after using Overdrive. (Max boost: 120% Overdrive Damage)

name: Sword Master
effect: Each Basic Attack or skill reduces target's Defense and Resistance by 1.8% (Max reduction: 18%). (Effect clears when switching targets) (Cannot stack with Gladiator)

name: Vanguard
effect: For each enemy Luminary damaged, increases Physical and Magic Defense by 6% (up to 30%).

name: Arrowslinger
effect: After every 5 Basic Attacks or skills, deal additional Damage equal to 75% of own Attack to the current target.

name: Tracker
effect: Each time you land a Critical Hit, your Attack increases by 1.4%. (Stacks 15 times) (Loses 1 stack if no Critical Hit within 3 seconds)

name: Guerrilla
effect: Upon landing a Basic Attack, deal additional Physical Damage equal to 10.4% of the target's current HP.

name: Hunter
effect: Each time you deal damage, your Attack increases by 0.8%. (Stacks up to 20 times)

name: Ranger
effect: For every 15 Critical Hits landed, boost your Attack by 20% and inflict random [Defense State Debuff] on your current target. (Attack boost lasts 3 seconds)

name: Scout
effect: During combat, increases your Attack Speed by 65%. (ST takes 30% less Basic Attack Damage)

name: Bloodhunter
effect: Each Buff Status gained, Attack is increases by 3%. (Max 10 stacks)

name: Bounty Hunter
effect: Gains [Frenzy], increasing Attack Speed by 160% but consumes 2% of max HP per second and inflicts [Silence] on self. (This effect triggers once every 30 seconds, lasting for 10 seconds each time)

name: Light Ranger
effect: When landing a Critical Hit, fire a light arrow at the target dealing 80% of ST's Attack as Damage. (Effect triggers once per 0.3s)

name: Sharpshooter
effect: After performing 5 Basic Attacks, its next Basic Attack increases Critical Hit by 1500 and Critical Damage by 90%.

name: Sniper
effect: When there are no enemy units nearby, gains a random [Attack Stat Buff] every 10 seconds.

name: Fortune Teller
effect: Each Overdrive boosts its damage by 15%. (Stacks up to 3 times)

name: Scholar
effect: All non-Overdrive abilities deal 30% more Damage. (Overdrive ability deals 20% less Damage)

name: Wizard
effect: First Overdrive costs 1 less Energy and deals 14% more damage.

name: Arcane Master
effect: Each skill cast increases damage dealt by 2.2%. (Stacks up to 10 times)

name: Elemental Mage
effect: For each debuff inflicted, the Luminary's attack increases by 2.4%. (Max 10 stacks)

name: Magister
effect: After scoring a Critical Hit, the next attack deals 14% more damage.

name: Sorcerer
effect: When dealing Overdrive Damage, 10% chance to inflit a random [Stat Debuff] on targets. (Effect can trigger on each target once every 6 seconds)

name: Astrologer
effect: The Luminary's Haste increases by 16, but skills deal 20% less damage.

name: Elementalist
effect: For each debuff on the target, deal additional damage equal to 26% of your Attack power. (Max additional damage: 130% of Attack)

name: Grand Archmage
effect: When landing a Critical Hit, Attack increases by 2.1%. (Stacks up to 15 times) (Loses 1 stack when failing to land a Critical Hit within 3 seconds)

name: Potion Master
effect: When dealing damage, has a 15% chance to inflict a random [Stat Debuff] on the target. (Can only trigger once per target every 4s)

name: Rune Mage
effect: For each buff on self, damage increases by 8%. (Up to a 32% damage increase)
